review.title: “SLOW UPHILL BATTLE”
review.pros: Pros – No micromanagement in place, honors all sorts of employee leaves, does not specify determined amount of leave time. it's pretty open as to when you need it.
review.cons: Cons – needs more organization, improve on management, needs to increase/bring salaries up to par with the market value.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – do employee reviews, increase salary base after 1 yr of employment, better healthcare benefits package, get feedback from other employees and look into complaints rather than sweeping them under the carpet. Add firewalls to your systems as the employees enjoy spending a lot of their spare time on Facebook.
